DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective project determine whether treatment SSRI , fluoxetine versus placebo reverse alteration central CRF system induce early life stress experience ( i.e . childhood sexual and/or physical abuse ) case without major depression . We also evaluate whether neuroendocrine change SSRI treatment correlate clinical improvement .
DOC.brief_title: Does Fluoxetine Have Effect CNS CRF Systems Women Abused Childhood ?
DOC.detailed_description: We compare indices central CRF activity ( i.e . ACTH cortisol response CRF stimulation test ) 8 week treatment either fluoxetine placebo woman history childhood abuse ( early life stress , ELS ) current major depression ( ELS/MDD ) , woman history childhood abuse without major depression ( ELS/non-MDD ) , woman without history childhood abuse major depression ( non-ELS/MDD ) . Changes neuroendocrine response CRF correlate psychological outcome measure . We hypothesize treatment fluoxetine normalize alter neuroendocrine responsiveness case ELS normalization correlate improvement symptom depression anxiety .
